settings.text: Our women's base layers are made with superfine 100% Royal Alpaca Wool, ethically sourced from small family farms in Peru. Alpaca wool fibers are naturally breathable and moisture-wicking, allowing for extra comfort and freshness throughout the whole day wherever you go. With clothing that regulates body temperature in heat and cold, you will enjoy your outdoor adventures in all weather conditions. In winter you can wear our base layers as thermal tops for skiing and snowboarding, and pair them with our shirts and leggings.
